attribs.description: Dungeon level. Could be specified in feet or meters, but it's simpler to use the number of floors.
attribs.name: Depth

attribs.description: Magic Points — reserves of magical energy used for casting.
attribs.name: MP

attribs.description: Hit Points — current health of a character.
attribs.name: HP

attribs.description: How full magic reserves can be for a character. Also determines MP regen rate.
attribs.name: Max MP

attribs.description: Turns remaining for the negative status to last.
attribs.name: Poisoned

attribs.description: Turns remaining for the negative status to last.
attribs.name: Burning

attribs.description: Experience is gained from combat or other actions. When high enough, set to 0 and increment XP Level.
attribs.name: XP

attribs.description:
Dexterity increases accuracy, evasion, and ranged damage dealt.

Choosing the Thief class grants 3 Dex.

Choosing the Archer class grants 2 Dex and 1 Str.
attribs.name: Dex

attribs.description:
Strength increases melee damage dealt.

Choosing the Melee class grants 2 Str, 1 Dex, and 2 Max HP.
attribs.name: Str

attribs.description:
Intelligence increases magic success, reserves (MP), and damage.

Choosing the Mage class grants 2 Int, 1 Dex, and 1 Max MP.

Choosing the Priest class grants 1 Int, 1 Max HP, and 2 Max MP.
attribs.name: Int

attribs.description:
Amount when fully healthy. Also determines HP regen rate.

To calculate, add the base species and class stat and multiply the result by XP Level.
attribs.name: Max HP

attribs.description: Harder is better quality but more difficult to craft.
attribs.name: Density

characters.description:
Dwarves are strong and tough, natural Melee Fighters, but clumsy and poor at magic.

Duplicate to create either a player char or NPC.
characters.name: Dwarf Template

characters.description:
Orcs are versatile fighters and can see in the dark. However, they're not well-liked.

Duplicate to create either a player char or NPC.
characters.name: Orc Template

characters.description:
Halflings are highly nimble, master Thieves and good with ranged weapons.

Duplicate to create either a player char or NPC.
characters.name: Halfling Template

characters.description:
Elves are intelligent and light on their feet, known especially for their Mages.

Duplicate to create either a player char or NPC.
characters.name: Elf Template

characters.description: Elf Archer, a player character (for example). A patch over his left eye has left him slower to react (-1 Dex), but his battle scars have made him resilient (+2 Max HP).
characters.name: Thornwick

events.description: Shape bow and attach string. Success requires dexterity.
events.name: Carve

items.description: Can be carved into weapons or torches or burned for fuel.
items.name: Pine Wood

items.description: For carving. Includes shelves to hold a selection of different kinds of wood.
items.name: Woodworking Table

locations.description: Torchlit and lined with crafting stations. A large central pillar supports the towering ceiling.
locations.name: Entry Cavern

overall.description: Your party was responding to a mysterious distress signal when suddenly, the ground below collapsed, and all fell down a nearly vertical shaft. No one seems to be injured (yet). Doubtless there are enemies in the surrounding caverns—good source of XP, an optimist would say. Modeled after classic tabletop RPGs or roguelikes. Start by creating your player characters based on templates for species and class. Then craft rudimentary supplies before embarking on an escape to the surface or delving deeper.
overall.title: Dungeon Crawl
